@comment scripts.build: compile production code of all workspaces
@comment scripts.build:watch: watch and compile of all workspaces in development mode
@comment scripts.test: run code tests of all workspaces
@comment scripts.test:watch: watch and run code tests of all workspaces
@comment scripts.test:coverage: collect test coverage of all workspaces
@comment scripts.clean: remove compiled code and coverage code of all workspaces
